abstract: General Electric said it would partner with Mubadala Development Company, an Abu Dhabi-based sovereign wealth fund, to create an $8 billion commercial finance fund.
snippet: General Electric said it would partner with Mubadala Development Company, an Abu Dhabi-based sovereign wealth fund, to create an $8 billion commercial finance fund.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to tap into higher returns overseas, General Electric said Tuesday that it would team up with a sovereign wealth fund in Abu Dhabi to create an $8 billion commercial finance fund based in the Middle East.

headline.main: G.E. and Abu Dhabi Fund Form Financial Partnership
headline.print_headline: G.E. and Abu Dhabi Fund Form Financial Partnership
